Posts.Content: Oct 31, 2010 10:36PM Fightinlikeagirl wrote: I am new here and I too took part in this tonight. I have a blog I write and I asked all my followers, friends and family memebers to join me in doing this. I did kindly remind them that Cancer doesn't only happen in a specific month. Cancer happens year round. People are diagnosed daily with all different kinds of cancer. Cancer awareness is a good thing.  Cancer awareness hopefully has reduced cancer from being the C-word to something that is openly talked about.
Posts.Title: Pinktober: It's Not Over 'Til We Say It's Over... EnglishMajor cookie97
